detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastening at the back.
Straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, covered buttons down the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Broderie anglaise and scalloped edges at the sleeves and hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Push-up bra in soft, stretch fabric with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners. Medium support. Seamless.

Skirt in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud and patch front pockets. Unlined. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short wrapover dress in a crisp weave with a V-neck, raglan puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and flared skirt with a wide flounced trim at the hem. Lined.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with an elasticated waist, pleats and a rounded hem.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with fringing at the front, a zip at the top and a braided shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with elastication and gathers at the neck and short puff sleeves.
V-neck top in sequined mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Large scarf in soft, checked fabric with fringes along the short sides.
Treggings in stretch twill with fake front pockets and real back pockets.Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Top in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front, narrow trims around the neckline and short sleeves with turn-ups.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a wide neckline with narrow elastication and a wide flounce that extends over the arms. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Court shoes with round toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Round, covered heels 9 cm.
Long cardigan in a soft pattern knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, gently rounded hem and no buttons. Longer at the back.
Lace push-up bralette with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in jersey with a low-cut neckline at the back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fitted jersey dress with a small stand-up collar, a zip at the back and cut-out sections at the waist.
Straight-cut silk blouse with an opening and button at the front and decorative seam at the back. Long trumpet sleeves with an asymmetric cut at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft velour made from a cotton blend. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Airy top with a small frilled collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a flounce at the ends, and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce on one side.
Joggers in a soft cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring waist, patch front pockets, a fake fly, back pockets and elasticated hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and slits at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and laser-cut edges. The briefs have a light sculpting effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave containing some wool with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and a pair of leggings in soft jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with pleats at the top of the shoulders, short sleeves and a box pleat at the back of the neck.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in soft, stretch twill made from a linen blend with a regular waist and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem with creases and a slit at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft, gently draping jersey with elastication and a flounced trim at the top and two high slits at the front. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide elasticated trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Short skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and tiers at the sides. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight cotton twill with a drawstring and belt loops at the waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Some of the polyester content of the joggers is recycled. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Pyjamas with a jersey T-shirt top and woven bottoms. T-shirt with a woven chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
Metal rings in various designs. Six decorated with glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the rings is recycled.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside and a stand-up collar with a zip and chin guard at the front. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with hole-embroidered sections, a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with gathers front and back, a frill over the shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe. Gently draped, double layered top, a seam under the bust, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with a lace bodice. V-neck front and back and a lace-trimmed seam at the waist. Concealed zip at the back and a gently flared, softly draping skirt. Lined at the top.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage with decorative lacing at the back.

Knee-length skirt in a softly draping viscose crêpe weave with a concealed zip in one side and high waist with concealed elastication. Gathered elastication at the front for a gently draped effect and best fit over the tummy.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back, long, wide sleeves with smocking and a small frill at the cuffs, and a skirt with gathered tiers. Lined.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening. Soft linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
Shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with lace-trimmed hems. High, frill-trimmed, elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring.
Jersey pyjama top and woven shorts. Top with a chest pocket and shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Pull-on trousers in woven fabric with a regular, elasticated waist and straight legs with multicoloured stripes down the sides.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in fine-knit linen with buttons down the front and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Short, A-line dress in soft cotton denim with a V-shaped opening and ties at the neckline. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seams with decorative gathers for added volume at the hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 9M-4Y) and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Ankle-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with long sleeves and covered buttons at the back. V-neck satin underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
Poncho in an airy weave with a decorated hem.
Hat in felted wool with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
